Based on your interest in war genre and plots related to what happened during certain periods, I'd highly recommend "Valkyrie" for you. This film dramatizes a real event - the July 20, 1944 assassination attempt against Adolf Hitler by German Army officers. Tom Cruise and Kenneth Branagh deliver compelling performances in this intriguing historical thriller.

Another movie that might catch your attention is "Zero Dark Thirty". This film chronicles the decade-long manhunt for Osama bin Laden, ending with his death in 2011. With powerful performances by Jessica Chastain and Joel Edgerton, this political drama offers a gripping portrayal of one of the most significant events in recent history. Enjoy the watch!
